articles.title: Greetings to Conference of Chongryon Branches-2016
articles.content:
Greetings to Conference of Chongryon Branches-2016
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Saturday sent a message of greeting to the Conference of Chongryon Branches-2016. 
					 The message said the officials and activists of branches of Chongryon (the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) have made a great contribution to laying the strong foundation to firmly defend Chongryon, patriotic legacy of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, build a Korean community pervaded with the Juche character and national character and usher in a fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It stressed the need for chiefs and members of Chongryon branches to solidify all the branches as bloodline linking the socialist motherland and Koreans in Japan with compatriotic feelings and patriotic and reliable pillars true to the idea and leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and take the lead in ushering in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It called for uniting all compatriots close around Chongryon and generalizing successes and experience gained in the 100-day campaign oriented to the conference of Chongryon branches and more dynamically waging the movement for creating patriotic models in the new heyday by the method of one person motivating ten and ten persons motivating 100.
					
					 It wished the conference a good success, expressing belief that the Conference of Chongryon Branches-2016 would mark an occasion of effecting significant leap forward in increasing the might of Chongryon in every way and ushering in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: DPRK Government Will Make Every Effort to Ensure Rights of People and Improve Their Living
articles.content:
DPRK Government Will Make Every Effort to Ensure Rights of People and Improve Their Living
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- There was a discussion on agenda item "Human Rights Protection and Promotion" from Oct. 28 to 31 at the meeting of the Third Committee (society, human rights and humanitarianism) of the 71st General Assembly of the United Nations.
					 The DPRK delegate said that thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un's policy of loving the future generations and the people, all the people fully exercise their rights and enjoy genuine human rights under the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 He said the DPRK government regards it as the most important state affair to take responsibility and care of the people's living and eradicate their sufferings and misfortunes.
					
					 The state is taking measures to mobilize all manpower, material and technical potentiality to bring as early as possible to normal the living of the people in the northern part who suffered serious damage owing to the unprecedented strong wind and heavy rain at the end of August and early in September and provide them with stable living conditions, he said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever make every effort to steadily develop the state system of guaranteeing human rights, ensure people's rights and improve their living.
					
					 Denouncing the reactionary nature of the "human rights" racket frantically kicked up by the hostile forces to bring down the idea and social system of the DPRK, he demanded the UN take up tortures of the CIA, all human rights abuses in the U.S., Japan's cunning moves to escape apology and reparation for the hideous unethical crimes, the south Korean puppet forces' group abduction of citizens of the DPRK, etc. as agenda items, and immediately take measures for them.
					
					 With regard to the fact the U.S. and Japan made provocations pulling up the DPRK over its non-existent "human rights issue", he urged the U.S. to mend the miserable human rights abuses in the U.S., the worst tundra of human rights in the world, before finding fault with others. He strongly demanded once again Japan immediately make an apology and reparation for the unethical crimes, not blindly following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Behave with Decorum
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Behave with Decorum 
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea on Nov. 4 issued a statement denouncing the Japanese authorities and right-wing reactionary forces for making last-ditch efforts, much upset by the dignity and might of the DPRK, a nuclear power in the East.
					 Upon hearing the news of the successful DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test, Prime Minister of Japan Abe at the extraordinary Diet session said that "it is a blatant challenge to the international community and unpardonable," crying out for "resolutely countering it in solidarity with the international community."
					
					 The gentries of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan cooked up even items of its independent sanctions such as expanding the list of re-entry of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) after visiting their homeland to be banned, restricting money remittance and thoroughly blocking trade with the DPRK via third country and are working hard to enforce the items. 
					
					 The House of Representatives and the House of Councillors of the Diet adopted a "protest resolution" over the DPRK's nuclear test for self-defence, vociferating about the shameful past history of Japan in which it fell victim to A-bomb explosion.
					
					 The statement ridiculed this as a poor behavior of the Japanese reactionaries internationally branded as a political dwarf.
					
					 What merits serious attention is that the Japanese reactionaries' anti-DPRK racket is an extremely grave political provocation as it is aimed at stamping out Chongryon, overseas citizens' organization of the dignified DPRK, and threatening the vital rights of Koreans in Japan, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries is to put spurs to Japan's militarization and realize its old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" at any cost.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' all sorts of unethical and inhumane actions to suppress and stifle Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are unpardonable provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities had better behave with decorum, bearing in mind that their more reckless anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon moves would only precipitate their most miserable final ruin in their own land.

articles.title: Congratulations to Ethiopian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Ethiopian FM
Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Friday sent a congratulatory message to Workneh Gebeyehu upon his appointment as foreign minister of Ethiopia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Malaysia
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Malaysia
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation headed by Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk left here Saturday to take part in the third Asia-Pacific regional high-level meeting on children's rights to be held in Kuala Lumpur.

articles.title: Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian
 Sinuiju, November 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Ri Hwak Sil, a woman centenarian, residing in Songso-ri, Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province.
					 Born into a poor peasant family, she was subject to maltreatment and contempt as a member of the stateless nation before the liberation of the country. It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she enjoyed a worthy life as a human being.
					
					 She is still keeping herself busy, cultivating kitchen garden and raising lots of domestic animals.

articles.title: New Aero-generator Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Aero-generator Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A research group of Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK developed a high-efficiency aero-generator.
					According to Kim Yong San, section chief of the university, this involute generator is nearly 50 percent in efficiency of energy transformation.
					
					And its blades can revolve smoothly even in soft wind without any vibration, irrespective of where wind sits.
					
					The new-type aero-generator is applicable to any buildings as well as the supply of power for street lamps and water pumping.

articles.title: Epidemiology Training Center in DPRK
articles.content:
Epidemiology Training Center in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- An epidemiology training center was set up at Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University of the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Kim Won Sam, head of a department of the college, told KCNA:
					
					 The training center, run in cooperation with the World Health Organization, gives a three-month course twice a year, with an aim to improve the practical ability of epidemiological officials throughout the country and put the information service on a scientific basis.
					
					 The course is conducted on the basis of curriculum set by the WHO and in combination with the work to perfect the country's general system of monitoring diseases.
					
					 Its subjects include epidemiology, life statistics and health information science.
					
					 The DPRK has directed big efforts to putting in-service training of health officials on a normal basis.

articles.title: Results of Campaign for Land Management in DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Campaign for Land Management in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The autumn campaign of land management has been conducted in the DPRK, registering good results.
					 In Kangwon Province, 4,000 cubic meters of earth were removed and 4,000 square meters of stones laid to reinforce the embankment along Jokchon Stream. Sepho County of the province successfully carried out the work to improve the 4 km-long road section.
					
					 Yodok County in South Hamgyong Province renovated bridges in Pyongyang-Chongjin road and built many protective walls in 7 km-long sections.
					
					 Such achievements were also made in Hwaphyong County of Jagang Province and Cholsan and Yomju counties of North Phyongan Province.
					
					 Sinyang County of South Phyongan Province repaired the embankments along the Piryu River and Phyongwon Stream in a week to prevent flood damage and built more than 20 sewage treatment plants.
					
					 Sinwon County of South Hwanghae Province is speeding up the road reconstruction in 4 km-long section at the final stage.

articles.title: Korean Feature Film "Graduation Diploma" Produced
articles.content:
Korean Feature Film "Graduation Diploma" Produced
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Feature film "Graduation Diploma" was produced in the DPRK.
					 The film depicts the first-term graduates from Kim Il Sung University who finished its course under the particularly warm loving care of President Kim Il Sung who built the first university of the people in the liberated country.
					
					 It instills into one the immutable truth that the honor of genuine life of revolutionary soldiers lies in continuing the path of loyalty and repayment, not forgetting the benevolence of the Party and the leader that bring up one and put forward one.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails German Chancellor's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails German Chancellor's Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- German Chancellor Merkel when receiving "Seoul Peace Prize" from the south Korean puppet forces on Nov. 2 talked nonsense about the DPRK, according to press reports.
					 She was reported to have said "north Korea has threatened neighboring countries with nuclear tests and missile launches for several years" and "the north Korean leadership is challenging the international community in defiance of international law."
					
					 If this is true, it seems she who claims to be chancellor of Germany styling itself a big power in Europe is not aware well of the essence of the situation on the Korean peninsula or she just parroted other's words.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the DPRK was compelled to opt for having access to nuclear weapons because it had to protect the nation's right to existence, the sovereignty of the country and peace of the region from the nuclear blackmail and potential threat of a nuclear war posed to it by the U.S. for decades.
					
					 It is not the DPRK that defies international law but it is the U.S. and its followers that are resorting to unprecedented sanctions and blockade to exterminate a nation in defiance of the UN Charter and the fundamental principles of international relations for the mere reason that it is not obedient to them.
					
					 This being a hard fact, Merkel known for "firm abidance to principle and cool-headedness" uttered something quite contrary to facts. We can not but take note of this.
					
					 Choe Sun Sil who is no more than an old witch had allegedly controlled the south Korean cultural field and had her hand stretched to Germany. This arouses suspicion about her behind-the-scene manipulation of the recent awarding of the "prize" to the German chancellor.
					
					 It seemed that Merkel read something written by Choe at the awarding ceremony.
					
					 Germany had better properly grasp the essence of the situation and behave itself, far from fanning up the escalation of tension on the Korean peninsula through the sale of war means such as Taurus missile to south Korea.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Snipes at S. Korean Regime's Military Nexus with U.S. and Japan
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Snipes at S. Korean Regime's Military Nexus with U.S. and Japan
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea is zealously tightening the military nexus with the U.S. and Japan under the pretext of coping with the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					 The puppet regime held a series of military confabs with the U.S. and Japan at which they were closeted over the issues of promoting the sharing of "military information about the north," boosting the tripartite military "cooperation" for "defence" and intensifying tripartite joint military drills.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers staged joint naval drills targeting the DPRK on October 22 and 23 in the wake of provocative missile alert rehearsals with the U.S. and Japan in waters off Hawaii in June last.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the Park regime started a comprehensive discussion to conclude an agreement on protection of military information with Japan on November 1.
					
					 This is nothing but a reckless and foolish act of the Park regime to persistently pursue its confrontation with the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. and Japan as it is rushing headlong into ruin.
					
					 The regime is recklessly clinging to the coattails of its U.S. and Japanese masters in a bid to prolong its remaining days.
					
					 Dancing to the tune of the U.S. trumpeting about "provocation", the regime cries out for "diplomatic and military pressure" on the DPRK and nexus between military deterrent."
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are staging madcap military operations and north-targeted war drills under various codenames with huge nuclear strategic assets of the U.S. and even Japan "Self-Defense Forces" involved.
					
					 It is the sinister design of the Park regime to unhesitatingly invite foreign aggressor troops and pave the way for the sworn enemy Japan's reinvasion in a bid to do harm to the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The Park group is bringing to light its sinister scenario to lay a military siege for isolating and stifling the DPRK by tightening military nexus with outsiders and escalate its standoff with the DPRK, backed by the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 The group is the hordes of the worst sycophants and traitors to the nation as it is seized with the wild dream for stifling the compatriots in the north in collusion with outsiders out of its inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the DPRK,
					
					 The south Koreans are now  getting increasingly vocal censuring the Park regime's moves to tighten military nexus as a risky act of bringing a new Cold War structure to Northeast Asia and helping Japan realize its wild ambition for emerging a military giant.
					
					 The Park regime is going reckless as a shock brigade of the U.S. for realizing its hegemonic wild ambition. This is little short of jumping into fire with faggot on its back.
					
					 The puppet regime's desperate moves to seek a chance of igniting a war against the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. and Japan and form a military alliance with them will only precipitate their miserable ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Discard Maladroit Way of Thinking
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Discard Maladroit Way of Thinking
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary urges Japan to discard its maladroit way of thinking.
					 Shortly ago, Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida said it decided not to pay its contribution to the UNESCO this year, forcing it to improve the procedures for examining items to be registered as world heritages.
					
					 Foreign media comment on Japan's behavior as a response to the UNESCO's putting the data on Japan's past Nanjing massacre on the list of registration of world heritages last year, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said insistence made by Japan is intended to have all heritages related to Japan's past crimes excluded from the list and threaten the UNESCO that if not, Japan would cut off the source of funds and strangle it. 
					
					 This is a revelation of the maladroit and vulgar way of thinking peculiar to Japan, a political dwarf, only.
					
					 Member nations of the UNESCO are obliged to make contributions according to its rules and they are not donations. But Japan is abusing it as a means for meeting its sinister political greed while regarding it a bargaining chip.
					
					 There are in the world not a few countries which committed wrongs in the past but there is no such country which behaves shamelessly and childishly as Japan.
					
					 What matters is that the act of the Japanese reactionaries to settle everything with money cannot be construed as immature diplomacy. Lurking behind this is a cynical ploy to conceal its past history of aggression and evade the state blame for its liquidation.
					
					 If Japan persistently resorts to its base acts to evade the responsibility, disregarding the truth of history, this will only add to its crimes and it will stand forsaken by the international community.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Crafty Aim Sought by Park Geun Hye in Replacing Her Confidants
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Crafty Aim Sought by Park Geun Hye in Replacing Her Confidants
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye driven into the worst crisis due to the monopolization of state affairs massively replaced her confidants of the secretaries room of Chongwadae on Oct. 30. As a result, U Pyong U, chief secretary for civilian administration, was replaced as he was bitterly cursed by people of all social standings for his power-backed scandal. Choe Jae Gyong was appointed to replace him. Choe is one of the closest confidants who have been so loyal to Park Geun Hye that he was called a "guard warrior" for her.
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary says Park's appointment of him was prompted by her crafty and foolish intention to conceal her monopolization of state affairs at any cost by using him.
					
					 But no matter what sleight of hand Park may employ to get rid of the crisis, it will not help her, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The whole of south Korea has turned into scenes of protest and punishment to cut the windpipes of Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil, chief culprits of the heinous monopolization of state affairs, and such human scum as Choe Jae Gyong who has committed all sorts of crimes, blinded with the greed for power.
					
					 Though Park is making desperate efforts to put the case under control and seek a way out through such despicable and shameless farce as the appointment of "political prosecutor", she can never quell the resistance of the angry south Korean people to bring the witch of Chongwadae to a court of history.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Prosecution's Plot to Cover up Scandal Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Prosecution's Plot to Cover up Scandal Disclosed
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that Choe Sun Sil took money from the Kukmin Bank during 31 hours till she appeared at the prosecution after she fled from Inchon Airport with the help of the prosecution, according to the south Korean paper Hangyore on Thursday.
					 The south Korean prosecution freed Choe as requested by her at the airport under the pretence of "bad health" and made an investigation into eight banks over amount of fund on Oct. 31, the next day she took money from the bank.
					
					 Furthermore, the prosecution excluded Choe Sun Sil and her daughter Jong Yu Ra and other key figures from the investigation list.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Forsaken Even by Her Confidants
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Forsaken Even by Her Confidants
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an article ridiculing Park Geun Hye on Wednesday.
					 As Park Geun Hye has faced the worst crisis due to the revelation of her scandal, her confidants are turning their back on her one after another, the article said, adding:
					
					 An Jong Bom, former senior secretary in charge of policy coordination of Chongwadae, and Jo Yun Son, minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, who had won the "deepest trust" of Park as her confidants, began passing the buck to Park.
					
					 Ri Sung Chol, vice-chairman of the "National Federation of Businessmen", is also taking the lead in shifting the blame.
					
					 But Ri Jong Hyon, representative of the "Saenuri Party", still goes with impunity.

articles.title: Rate of Supporting Park Geun Hye Hits All-time Low in South Korea
articles.content:
Rate of Supporting Park Geun Hye Hits All-time Low in South Korea
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The rate of supporting Park Geun Hye hit an all-time low of 5 percent, according to media reports in Seoul on Friday.
					 According to the results of a public opinion poll conducted from Tuesday to Thursday, nearly 100 percent of the respondents reportedly said no to Park.

articles.title: Protest Actions against Park Geun Hye Gain in Scope and Strength across S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Actions against Park Geun Hye Gain in Scope and Strength across S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A protest against Park Geun Hye is mounting as the days go by because she is making desperate efforts to stay in power through all intrigues, defying the unanimous demand of the south Korean people of all social standings for her resignation, according to press reports.
					 1 553 organizations formed an emergency situation council on Nov. 2 and launched a joint action.
					
					 In a special resolution they said it is clear that Park's resignation is a shortcut to putting the present chaos under control.
					
					 47 societies and organizations of the historic circle on Nov. 1 in a declaration on the situation said it has been fully disclosed that the unilateral policies are not the results of the normal administration of state affairs.
					
					 On Nov. 3 civic and public organizations conducted campaigns for publishing declarations on the situation in Seoul, Ulsan, Jonju of North Jolla Province and other places and declared that they would turn out in the all-people campaign for the regime change on Nov. 12.
					
					 Members of at least 40 women's organizations conducted the campaign for publishing a declaration on the situation that day.
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions held an emergency situation meeting on Nov. 2 at which it declared it would focus all efforts on the action for force Park to step down through a general strike.
					
					 On Nov. 4 artistes issued a declaration on the situation signed by 7 449 persons of 288 organizations of culture and arts in demand of the resignation of Park Geun Hye and the minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, the chief culprits of the power-backed scandals.
					
					 34 organizations of the educational circle declared they would launch a campaign for publishing the declaration on the situation across south Korea all at once.
					
					 University students decided to form situation councils and stage joint actions.
					
					 Students of Korea University and Hongik University conducted a campaign for publishing the declaration on the situation in Seoul and more than 2 000 professors belonging to the Council of Professors for Democracy said that no attempt should be allowed to obstruct the probe into the truth.
					
					 On Nov. 3 members of the Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and professors and students of universities simultaneously launched a campaign for publishing the declaration on the situation.
					
					 At least 20 elders of various circles held a press conference in Seoul and published a declaration on the situation.
					
					 A candelight action took place at Chonggye plaza in Seoul on Nov. 2 under the sponsorship of the 2016 Headquarters for People's All-out Action.
					
					 Lawmakers from opposition parties are joining in the above-said actions.
					
					 Ten lawmakers from opposition parties at the full-dress session of the "National Assembly" on Nov. 3 demanded Park not only accept the investigation by the prosecution but take step down or hand off state affairs.

articles.title: S. Korean People Reject Park Geun Hye's "Statement to People"
articles.content:
S. Korean People Reject Park Geun Hye's "Statement to People"
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye issued a "statement to the people" on Nov. 4 as regards the rare scandal on intervention in state affairs, according to reports from Seoul.
					 The traitor did not mention a word about her crimes, even though she said she makes a "sincere apology once again" and she would "accept even investigation by special inspection". She said that Choe Sun Sil's role was confined to individual realm and the intervention in state affairs was Choe's individual mistake.
					
					 Park responded to the south Korean people's demand for resignation with such sophism that it is necessary to prevent confusion of state affairs and blank, while trumpeting about "security crisis" and "difficult economy".
					
					 A senior spokesman for the Minju Party held that it was an individual remark not enough to defuse the people's resentment and uneasiness.
					
					 The chairman of the emergency measure committee and concurrently floor leader of the Kukmin Party said that Park claimed power-backed scandals were for "economy and people's life" but this pretence was little short of stabbing the people in the chest.
					
					 The former permanent co-representative of the Kukmin Party condemned Park's "statement" as the "one for turning phase, not caring about the people's mind" and the "one for shifting her blame onto others".
					
					 Meanwhile, civic and public organizations said they cannot accept Park's "statement" and declared to stage a large-scale candlelight rally at weekend as scheduled.
					
					 Accusations were heard from lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" who do not belong to pro-Park circle.
					
					 According to KBS, foreign press is making negative and cold analysis of Park's "statement".

articles.title: S. Korean CBS Chides Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People"
articles.content:
S. Korean CBS Chides Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People" 
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS on Nov. 4 denounced Park Geun Hye's brazen-faced "talk to the people" evading the responsibility for the administration chaos.
					 Park Geun Hye failed to make the people understand through her second apology "talk to the people", missing another chance, the broadcasting service said, and went on:
					
					 Park should have clarified all suspicions before the people, not before the prosecution.
					
					 In the final analysis, Park failed to make people understand, adding to her disgrace.
					
					 The campaign for issuing declarations on the situation demanding Park's resignation is going on among universities, civic organizations, religious circle and other people of south Korea despite her "talk to the people".

articles.title: Satirical Story about Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil Produced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Satirical Story about Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil Produced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A satirical story "Story of Princess" depicting Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil, heroines of the case of monopoly of administration, was posted on the internet homepage of Yonsei University of south Korea on October 27, drawing the greatest attention, according to a report.
					 The story satirizing Park Geun Hye, and Choe Thae Min and his daughter Choe Sun Sil who have controlled Park, has gained popularity among the south Korean people immediately since it saw the light. 
					
					 It is reported that the readers say that it is as vivid as a classical literature.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iran
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A committee of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated with due ceremony on Nov. 1.
					 The deputy general secretary of the party was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to set the remembrance period from Nov. 1 to Dec. 20 on the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il and organize political and cultural events praising his revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Spain
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A Spanish remembrance committee for observing the 5th anniversary of demise of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 1.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to set up a website and give wide publicity to the works and exploits of Kim Jong Il and hold political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting and seminar on the above-said anniversary.

articles.title: Foreign Media Report Political Crisis in S. Korea
articles.content:
Foreign Media Report Political Crisis in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- "Tragic end of 'yusin' dictator's descendant," "Park Geun Hye's impeachment is unavoidable," "Park Geun Hye lost moral prestige, became vegetable-like president,'" etc.
					 These are world media comments about the poor situation of traitor Park Geun Hye who lost qualifications as chief executive owing to the ceaseless disclosure of despicable scandals in south Korea.
					
					 Foreign media air the political crisis in south Korea caused by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors as breaking news.
					
					 Radio Sputnik of Russia said these days not only south Korean people from all walks of life but also confidants of Park strongly denounce her.
					
					 The Chinese People's Daily said south Koreans are growing vocal calling for resignation of Park and "impeachment" is the priority topic of media.
					
					 The Chinese Huan Qui Shibao said media of different countries of the world think that the political life of Park will come to an end with the present case as a momentum. 
					
					 The Turkish paper Hurriyet Daily News, AP, The New York Times and the Washington Post and the UK paper Financial Times said Park Geun Hye who became the president as daughter of military dictator was in the worst political crisis.
					
					 Foreign media said suspicion and distrust about the decision of THAAD deployment in south Korea swelled owing to the scandal this time and this will make the practical deployment of THAAD more difficult.

articles.title: Presidium de APS saluda Conferencia de Representantes de Sucursales de Chongryon
articles.content:
Presidium de APS saluda Conferencia de Representantes de Sucursales de Chongryon
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion a la Conferencia de Representantes de las Sucursales de la Chongryon-2016.
					La misiva recuerda que anteriormente, los funcionarios y activistas de las sucursales de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) hicieron gran aporte a defender con firmeza esta organizacion, herencia patriotica de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, construir la sociedad de compatriotas con fuerte caracter Juche y nacionalidad y preparar la firme base para abrir la nueva era dorada del movimiento de coreanos residentes en Japon. 
					
					En fiel acato a la idea y direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, los jefes y miembros de las sucursales de la Chongryon deben consolidarlas como solidas bases de enlace y patriotismo, que conecten la patria socialista con los compatriotas en Japon, y tomar la delantera en abrir la nueva era de esplendor del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon, destaca. 
					
					Insiste en agrupar a los compatriotas en torno a la Chongryon y generalizar los exitos y experiencias de la campana intensiva de 100 dias con vistas a la presente Conferencia para dinamizar el movimiento de creacion de conductas patrioticas ejemplares en la nueva era de prosperidad. 
					
					Convencido de que la presente Conferencia sera una oportunidad de viraje decisivo en consolidar el poderio de la Chongryon y abrir la nueva era de auge del movimiento de coreanos residentes en Japon, el mensaje formula votos por los exitos en los trabajos de la reunion.

articles.title: Delegacion de salud publica de RPDC parte a Malasia
articles.content:
Delegacion de salud publica de RPDC parte a Malasia
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion de salud publica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el ministro de Salud Publica Kang Ha Guk, partio el dia 5 de esta capital para participar en la III reunion regional de alto nivel de Asia-Pacifico sobre los derechos de la infancia que se efectuara en Kuala Lumpur, Malasia.

articles.title: RPDC hara todo lo posible para asegurar derechos del pueblo y mejorar su vida
articles.content:
RPDC hara todo lo posible para asegurar derechos del pueblo y mejorar su vida
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del 28 al 31 del mes expirado el debate sobre la "Proteccion y fomento de derechos humanos" en la reunion del 3o comite (sociedad, derechos humanos y humanitarismo) del 71o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					En la ocasion, el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio el siguiente discurso:
					
					Gracias a la politica del Presidente Kim Jong Un de amar a las generaciones venideras y al pueblo, todo el pueblo coreano ejerce a sus anchas sus derechos y disfruta de los verdaderos derechos humanos en el regimen socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC presenta como asunto mas importante responsabilizarse y atender la vida del pueblo y liberarlo de sufrimientos y desgracias.
					
					Para estabilizar cuanto antes la vida de los moradores de las zonas septentrionales de la RPDC, que sufrieron grandes perdidas por la rafaga y lluvias torrenciales observadas desde finales de agosto hasta principios de septiembre, el Estado toma las medidas para concentrar y movilizar todas las potencialidades humanas, materiales y tecnicas del pais.
					
					En el futuro tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC hara todo lo posible para consolidar el regimen de aseguramiento de derechos humanos del pais, garantizar los derechos del pueblo y mejorar las condiciones de su vida.
					
					En su discurso, el delegado revelo la esencia y el caracter reaccionario de la campana de "DDHH" que desarrollan freneticamente las fuerzas hostiles para eliminar la idea y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Demando a la ONU tratar como agenda oficial las torturas de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia de Estados Unidos, la violacion de DDHH en este pais, las astutas maniobras de Japon para eludir la disculpa y la indemnizacion sobre sus archi-crimenes antieticos del pasado, el rapto y secuestro colectivos de los habitantes de la RPDC por los titeres surcoreanos y otros, y tomar las medidas urgentes por el respecto.
					
					En cuanto a la acusacion de EE.UU. y Japon del inexistente "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC, el replico al primero que corrija el miserable estado de DDHH de su pais, convertido en el peor violador de DDHH del mundo, antes de criticar a otros y exigio reiterada y fuertemente al pais isleno que pida disculpas e indemnice ahora mismo sus crimenes antieticos del pasado sin obedecer a ciegas a la politica hostil norteamericana a la RPDC.

articles.title: CCACU exige a Japon parar la campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon
articles.content:
CCACU exige a Japon parar la campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano de Ayuda a los Compatriotas en Ultramar hizo publica el dia 4 una declaracion denunciando la demencial campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon de las autoridades y reaccionarios derechistas de Japon, atemorizados ante la autoridad y el prestigio de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, emergida como potencia nuclear del Oriente. 
					Informado de la exitosa prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear de la RPDC, el premier japones Abe disparateo en la sesion extraordinaria de la Dieta que "es intolerable y evidente desafio a la sociedad internacional" y "tomara rotundas contramedidas en colaboracion con esta", senala el texto y continua:
					
					Los compinches del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon inventaron y tratan de poner en practica los reglones de sancion independiente, tales como la ampliacion de la lista de prohibicion de reentrada en Japon sobre los cuadros de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) despues de la visita a la RPDC, la restriccion de remesas y el bloqueo de comercio exterior con la RPDC por via de tercer pais. 
					
					Segun trascendidos, las camaras de representantes y de consejeros de la Dieta aprobaron la llamada "resolucion de protesta" a la prueba nuclear de la RPDC con fines de autodefensa mencionando el antecedente vergonzoso de su pais como unica victima de bomba atomica. 
					
					Es un proceder ridiculo de los reaccionarios japoneses, repudiados como politicos enanos por la sociedad internacional.
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que la campana anti-RPDC resulta una grave provocacion politica para exterminar la Chongryon, digna entidad de ciudadanos ultramarinos de la RPDC, y amenazar el derecho a la subsistencia de los compatriotas residentes en Japon. 
					
					La verdadera intencion de ellos es dar acicate a la militarizacion y realizar a toda costa su anejada ambicion de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental". 
					
					La represion inhumanitaria y antietica de toda indole contra la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon deviene una provocacion imperdonable a la RPDC. 
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que su imprudente ofensiva anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon acelerara mas el momento de arruinamiento mas tragico que probaran en territorio propio.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la pronunciacion de Merkel
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la pronunciacion de Merkel
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, la premier alemana Merkel recibio el dia 2 el "Premio de Paz de Seul" por parte de las autoridades surcoreanas, ocasion en la cual hizo una pronunciacion absurda sobre la RPDC.
					Dicen que ella ha disparateado que "durante varios anos el Norte de Corea amenaza a los paises vecinos realizando la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misiles" y que la "Direccion del Norte de Corea desafia a la comunidad internacional despreciando las leyes internacionales". 
					
					Este hecho muestra que la premier de ese pais europeo, que se autodenomina como potencia de Europa, no conoce correctamente la esencia de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana o repite las palabras de otros. 
					
					Ya esta conocido por todo el mundo el hecho de que la RPDC se vio obligada a optar el camino de poseer las armas nucleares para defender el derecho a subsistencia nacional, la soberania del pais y la paz regional desde el chantaje nuclear y la verdadera amenaza de guerra nuclear provenientes durante varios decenios desde el pais norteamericano. 
					
					Los que menosprecian las leyes internacionales no es la RPDC, sino EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras que se recurren a las campanas de sancion y bloqueo sin precedentes en la historia para exterminar a una nacion solo por una razon de que esta no se obedece a sus demandas pisoteando la Carta de la ONU y los principios fundamentales de relaciones internacionales. 
					
					Nos vemos obligado a prestar atencion a las palabras contrarias a la realidad pronunciadas esta vez por la premier Merkel, conocida como mujer que no pierde los "principios y la serenidad". 
					
					Se dice que Choe, no es mas que una hechicera, manejo a su antojo ya el circulo cultural surcoreano y extendio su garra tambien a Alemania. Este hecho causa la curiosidad de que el otorgamiento del "premio" a Merkel fuera el guion de Choe.
					
					Parece que Merkel haya leido algo escrito por Choe en la ceremonia de otorgamiento. 
					
					Alemania no debe instigar el agravamiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al vender a Sur de Corea los pertrechos belicos tales como misiles Taurus, sino tiene que portarse correctamente viendo bien la esencia de la situacion.
